name: Mitigation Playbook for PowerShell Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where a malicious actor executed PowerShell scripts to compromise a system.

action--d58db9a7-579c-4b51-b87b-a2502b3a.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--d58db9a7-579c-4b51-b87b-a2502b3a.description: Terminate any running PowerShell processes that may be executing malicious scripts.

if-condition--7ef929f2-108b-4d2b-a8dc-2f.name: Check if PowerShell process was running

action--1366a6e9-7bf2-4ea1-b2c2-3461b6d5.name: Isolate infected host from network
action--1366a6e9-7bf2-4ea1-b2c2-3461b6d5.description: Disconnect the infected host from the network to prevent further damage.

action--b4c8f61e-1f3d-45ab-9c4e-0a1b4b11.name: Conduct a full antivirus scan
action--b4c8f61e-1f3d-45ab-9c4e-0a1b4b11.description: Perform a comprehensive scan of the system to detect and remove any residual malware.

while-condition--c8f2b5c4-2d4b-4b23-a078.name: Antivirus Scan Loop
while-condition--c8f2b5c4-2d4b-4b23-a078.description: Continue scanning until the system is clean.

action--c6fcee2b-fcde-435b-8f06-4900734d.name: Review and clean up firewall rules
action--c6fcee2b-fcde-435b-8f06-4900734d.description: Reset firewall rules to eliminate any vulnerabilities.

action--07b98dee-4ab7-4522-8c00-fc8967ec.name: Update PowerShell execution policy to restrict scripts
action--07b98dee-4ab7-4522-8c00-fc8967ec.description: Change the PowerShell execution policy to prevent unauthorized scripts from running.
